import Head from '../components/head' import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useCurrentUser } from '../lib/hooks' const CreatePost=()=>{ const [user] = useCurrentUser(); const [errMsg, setErrMsg] = useState('') const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState({image_link:'',caption:'', author:'',source:'', source_link:'', category:'', headings:''}) const handleInput = (e)=>{ const value = e.target.value; setInputValue({...inputValue, [e.target.name]:value}) } async function hanldeSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const body = { image_link: e.currentTarget.image_link.value, caption: e.currentTarget.caption.value, author: e.currentTarget.author.value, source: e.currentTarget.source.value, source_link: e.currentTarget.source_link.value, category: e.currentTarget.category.value, headings: e.currentTarget.headings.value, abstract_cat: e.currentTarget.abstract_cat.value, content: e.currentTarget.content.value, date: new Date().toString().slice(0,16) }; console.log(body); /*e.preventDefault(); const body = { content: e.currentTarget.content.value, }; if (!e.currentTarget.content.value) return; e.currentTarget.content.value = ''; await fetch('/api/posts', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(body), }); // revalidate the `post-pages` key in usePostPages revalidate(); // Perhaps show a dialog box informing the post has been posted */ } return(

NEWS POST

) } export default CreatePost
